bibl.title: Fatalistic Beliefs in Religion, Folklore, and Literature. Papers read at the Symposium on Fatalistic Beliefs. Äbo, 7th-9th of September, 1964
bibl.seg: Ringgren Helmer, 'I Overcome Fate, Fate Harkens to Me.' Some Observations on Isis as a Goddess of Fate.

Fatalistic Beliefs in Religion, Folklore, and Literature. Papers read at the Symposium on Fatalistic Beliefs. Äbo, 7th-9th of September, 1964 = Scripta Instituti Donneriani Aboensis. II (Stockholm, 1967) pp. 35-51.
